H0.text: Which British actress played Valerie in the 1997 film ‘Nil By Mouth’. Kate Winslet

H1.text: Which British actress played Valerie in the 1997 film ‘Nil By Mouth’. Helena Bonham Carter

H2.text: Which British actress played Valerie in the 1997 film ‘Nil By Mouth’. Samantha Morton

H3.text: Which British actress played Valerie in the 1997 film ‘Nil By Mouth’. Kathy Burke

A4.text: The role of Valerie in Nil By Mouth was played by Kathy Burke.

A5.text: The role of Valerie in Nil By Mouth was portrayed by Kathy Burke, not Kate Winslet.
